Abasomesa ba Kateme bageziizaaku okumulambira aye tacuusaamu naire. Abazaire ba Kateme ti betaaga mbeera dha Kateme dhe yeebisaamu nga atumiibwa okukola emirimo okugeza nga atumiibwa okuja okuwerera enku,  eira nga esaawa dhi jiire.

title: Buzuba Bwacoolwe Bwa Hamisi
description: Hamisi uyandika yunifoomu yakucikolo. Kabaya kumaaketi Hamisi wabona alimwi shaati libotu. Mali ngobajisi bausyi masyoonto cakuti bakozya biyo kuula yunifoomu. Bausyi bajata bubi kusola kuti batalubizyi mukulanga ciyandika.

description: M'dame  Maneo plante une graine de citrouille. Elle pousse et devient une énorme citrouille. En été, cette citouille offre  une grande surprise à  tous les habitants de la vallée.

title: Likhutu Linyoola Inzu Yalio

title: Peddy the lazy girl
description: Peddy is a young girl and her parents are afraid for her because she is lazy in doing work at home even at school. She wakes up very late and does not do anything before going to school but still ends up sitting under trees. Peddy's teachers have tried to discipline her but she does not change her ways. Peddy's parents don't like the way Peddy conducts herself when sent to do some duty.

description: A child who went on a trip to Zanzibar exploring different things in the environment.

title: Katintu Mumambo, akaghala akagezi
description: Katintu Mumambo akozesa amagezi ge okwewonhia ni baganda be ku gusota ogunene. Aye oluvainhuma bagandabe bamwabulira mu nsulo era endhovu yaamumira. Katiitu aneewonhia atya?
author: Kyambogo  University

title: Esuju Ameo
description: Ameo oko pito nyige me esuju. Di eko dongo doko esuju ka dwong. Ikare me ceng esuju noni oko timo the jo me kor moru gia uura.

title: Sàár Nyam Dwaayi (An Animal Story)
description: Da̱khwòón na̱ shu dì khi mò Sheky,  bò Bòráát gbáá Nanggwang. The story of a Hare,  a Crown Bird and a Leopard.

title: Siku La Mwayi La Hamisi
description: Hamisi afunisisa kunkala na shati yamene aona munyamata avala munjila.

title: Samaki Mkarimu

title: Katitu Momambo, Die Slim Dogtertjie
description: Die ' slim dogtertjie ' behoort aan 'n bekende soort storie waar 'n kwesbare jong meisie (of jong seun) wat sy of haar susters volg wanneer hulle soek na kos en hout, sy red die lewens van ander , deur die beoefening van haar wysheid, die krag van woorde en bonatuurlike manier om probleme op te los.
author: Ansa Janse van Vuuren

title: Die Sewende Son: ŉ Indiese Volksverhaal Uit Odisha
description: Hierdie boek gaan oor hoe die wêreld voorheen was. Daar was sewe sonne en het die aarde baie warm gemaak. Die mense wou al die sonne doodmaak, maar het net ses doodgemaak. Die laaste son was baie bang en het agter ŉ heuwel gaan wegkruip. Al die diere het probeer om die son te laat uitkom, maar niemand kon dit regkry nie. Die haan het dit uiteindelik reggekry om die son te laat uitkom. Van daardie dag af het die son elke oggend opgekom wanneer die haan kraai.
author: Elizabeth Buys

title: Eiribwa lya Malevu
description: Malevu asimba empambo. Ekula yafukamu ogulibwa ogunene. Mukasana eiribwa lyewunikiriza abantu bomukiiko.

title: Ek en my Groot Familie
description: A story about a little boy's adventures with a very unusual family!

title: Mwana semuyananisi
description: Mudunhu reTurkana,  mai vakasiya mwana pasi pemuti vachikwira mumuti kunotemha muchero. Munhu aidarika akaona mwana ari pasi pemuti. Chii chichaitika kumwana?

title: Hamisi Zunoɔ Bebiri
description: Hamisi nyɛɛ dɔɔlee ka o yɛre kpareveɛlaa, ka o boɔ ka o meŋ taa a kparoo na tɔ.

title: My First  Trip to  Kampala

title: A Abóbora Do 'm'e Maneo
description: 'M'e Maneo planta uma semente de abóbora. Ela cresce e torna-se numa enorme abóbora. Esta abóbora apresenta uma grande surpresa para todas as pessoas do vale.

title: Child as a peacemaker

title: Ek hou van lees

title: Hamisi Zuɣ'Suŋ Dabsili
description: Hamisi nya bidilbla ka o ye seeti viɛlli, ka o bori ni o di mali di kpeei.

title: The generous fish
description: Nosisa lives with her mother and father in a small village. Her father treats her mother badly,  and she runs away,  leaving her daughter. Nosisa's father marries again and the new wife is cruel to Nosisa. One day the girl takes refuge at a local stream and meets a fish that will change her life.

title: The Seventh Sun: A Tribal Tale From Odisha, India

title: Urugyendo Muri Zanzibar

title: Scientists Develop Spacecraft Powered by Steam
Sami embwa yange eyo omuzaanho
description: Sami ayenda inho okuzaana ate mutumbbaavu. Mbwa yange era ngyenda inho.

title: Eka  Yange  N'Anyowe
description: Orubazo orukukwataho omwojo nebiyatangaine n'Eka etali yabulikiro.
author: Kangume Rhodah

title: Ekyozi kya Maneo
description: 'M'e Maneo abwire etsigo ya kyozi. Ekuziire ya ba mpango. Omukyanda ekyozi ekyi,  kyine akyokutangaza aha bantu bomwihanga.
author: Stuart Ampaire

title: Katitu Momambo, L'Histoire D'Une Petite Fille Très Intelligente
description: Katitu Momambo utilise son intelligence pour se sauver, elle et ses sœurs, d'un Serpent géant. Mais ensuite, ses sœurs l'abandonnent dans un puits et un éléphant l'avale. Comment Katitu s'est-elle sauvée ?
author: Berthelot Paul (Bruno)

title: Hamisi Manye Ligbi
description: Hamisi na nyumuyo ko nɛ wo afɛu tade ko, nɛ e na lɛ hu e ngɛ eko.
author: Elizabeth Ocansey (OLE Ghana)

title: Le Septième Soleil: Une Fable Tribale D'Odisha, en Inde
description: Il y avait jadis sept soleils dans le ciel. Comme il faisait très chaud, les gens décidèrent de s'en débarrasser. Mais ils allèrent trop loin, et c'est finalement un coq qui sauva le jour.
author: Olivia Mahe

title: Mtoto aliyeleta Amani
description: Katika sehemu za pori za Turkana,  mwanamke anamwacha mtoto wake chini ya mti naye anaupanda mti kutafuta matunda. Mgeni alimwona mtoto akiwa peke yake. Je,  mambo yanakuwa namna gani kwa mtoto?
author: Translators without Borders

title: Olugendo Lwange olwasoka E Kampala
description: Omwana ayagenda kulugendo E Kampala nga alambula ebintu ebyenjawulo.
author: joel gasta

title: Kato Clever and the Big Trouble
description: Kato the squirrel's family lived in a garden. One day, some people came there with machines to cut down the trees. How did Kato and his friends save themselves from this 'big trouble'?
author: Herminder Ohri

title: Ekai and the Domestic Animals
description: Ekai a standard 3 boy, he has a passion for domesticating all sorts of domestic animals therefore uses all his holiday break with the help of her sister and little brother to attend to the animals and birds and make sure they are healthy.
author: Mele Joab

title: Entambula yange ebuzanziba
description: Amwana eyaja mulugendho e'zanzibar okulambuula ebintu byobutonde.
author: Francis  Bananwa

title: Discrete mathematics
description: Cellular automata; combinatorics; game theory; algorithms; recursion; graph theory; linear programming; order and lattices; theory of computation; chaos

title: Mokopu Oa 'm'e Maneo
description: ‘M'e Maneo o lema thotse ea mokopu. E hola hahola ho etsa mokopu o moholohali. Haele hlabula,  o makatsa batho bohle ba motse.
author: Marion Drew

title: Hamisi's lucky day
description: Hamisi sees a boy at the market wearing an attractive green shirt. Will Hamisi be able to persuade his father to buy him the same shirt?
author: Adelheid Marie Bwire

title: Sami My Playful dog
description: Sami is so playful and naughty. He is my dog and i love him.
author: Simon Bukenya

title: Omuwana nga hola emerembe
description: Mu shalo sha Turkana omuhasi a leha omuwana waye asi waomusala na nina omusala o konya ebi bala. Omundu ata manyihane a bona omuwana yenane. Sena asha ba who muwana?
author: Wafula Keith

title: Sua ya mwonza
description: The Seventh Sun is a simple tale from a tribal community in Odisha,  India. It is about a time when there were seven suns in the sky. Were the animals and human beings happy with so many suns? Find out for yourself in this story which teaches us to respect nature.
author: Anna Kula

title: 'n Baie Lang Man
description: Die man in hierdie storie is te lank en alles om hom is te kort,  of te klein.
author: Came le Roux

title: Sandile Nelibhola Lakhe
description: Lena yindzaba lemayelana nemfana lobekanesifiso sekutsi abe nelibhola lakhe.
author: Linda Jackson Mandla

title: Ekai's First Day In School
description: The story of Ekai on his first day in school. His experiences and encounters remained exciting to him as everything was absolutely strange.
author: Alice Edui

title: Hamisi Ƒe Dzɔgbenyuie Ŋkeke
description: Hamisi kpɔ ŋutsuvi aɖe le awu dzeani aɖe me eye wὸdzroe be awua ƒe ɖe nanɔ ye hã si.
author: Janet Ahiatrogah (OLE Ghana)

title: Olugendo lw'e Zanzibari
description: Omwana eyaja mu lugendo lw' e Zanzibari yaalambuula ebintu eby'obutonde eby'endhawulo.
author: Kyambogo  University

title: Sayari Jua ya Saba
description: Palikuwa na wakati ambapo kulikuwa na jua saba angani. Kwa sababu ya joto jingi,  watu wanaamua kuziondoa jua zote. Wanaenda mbali zaidi na hatimaye,  ni jogoo ndiye anayeiokoa siku.
author: Kamundi Mutugi

title: Omwana w'emirembe
description: Omukazi n'omwana ghe mukibira ki ekyabatukaku?
author: Charles Eramaga

title: UKato ohlakaniphileyo nengxaki enkulu
description: UKato nosapho lwakhe lwamagala wayehlala kumyezo thile. Ngenye imini,  kwafika bantu bathile bephethe oomatshini bezokugawula imithi. Wazisindisa kanjani uKato nabahlobo bakhe kuloongxaki enkulu?
author: Kholeka Mabeta

title: A Viúva e o Juiz
description: A parábola contado por Jesus em Lucas,  capítulo 18,  © 1999 Bible League Intl. Versão Fácil de Ler.
author: Little Zebra Books

title: Sanin Damisar Bunu
description: Bunu ya bada labarin damisa,  dabbar da bai sani ba sosai.
author: Muhammad Tukur Bala

title: Ekalokan
description: Ayei kolong ekalokan,  aloki ng'esi ng'itieng anariyet. Ng'irwa lukaalak ng'isuruma ng'esi tani etieng'it epei. Abu akoro tanyam ng'esi ka awi keng lokojokon.
author: John  Ng'asike

title: Kato mwakili, na Shida Kubwa
description: Familia ya Kato,  Kichakuro,  iliishi katika bustani. Siku moja watu kadhaa walifika pale na mashine kukata miti. Ni vipi Kato na marafiki zake walijiepusha na hii 'shida kubwa?'.
author: Brigid Simiyu

title: Enkerai Nayaua Eseriani
description: Enkerai nayawua eseriani.
author: John Nga'sike

title: Enkolóng E Naápishana
description: Kétíi apá enkatá nátií inkólóng'i náapishana oloing'áng'e. Óre te enkárakí enkirówuaj, néar iltung'aná nénâ ólong'i. Néísik. Néaku olkúku ótasayíá enkolóng metúshukunye.
author: Leonard Kotikash

title: LACHO MA BOH
description: Lacho i ododong boh tutwal jami weng ingere chyek no tidi tutwal. Dong yubu jami ma dit bene boh chalo en me copo peko neh.
author: Tony Rangan

title: Hamisi Ne Tsir Nkwa Da
description: Hamisi hu banyimba bi dɛ ɔhyɛ sortar fɛɛfɛɛfɛw bi, na neyamu a nkyɛ no so benya bi ahyɛ.
author: Gabriel Ampah Sam (OLE Ghana)

title: Hibernation
description: This short reading explains how an animal's body adapts for hibernation in the winter.

title: Sanin Damisar Bunu
description: Bunu ya bada labarin Damisa,  dabbar da bai sani ba sosai.
author: Abubakar Saidu-Sado

title: Enkerai Nayawua Eseriani
description: Enkerai nayaka oolmurrani le nkae murrua eseriani.
author: Susan Nashipae

title: Kato omugezi n'ekibonerezo  ekibbede
description: Kato ow'endhu ya wakadaada baali baviira mukalimiro. Lwali lulala,  omuntu yaaja yo ni doloma okusala emiti. Ngeri ki Kato ni mikwanogye ye baawonamu ekizibu ekinene kiti?
author: Edison Kasajja

title: Le Jour De Chance D'Hamisi !
description: Hamisi voit un garcon vêtu d'une belle chemise et souhaiterait en avoir une lui aussi.
author: Nadine Verdier

title: Mtongi na Mantsiwa
description: A parábola contado por Jesus em Lucas,  capítulo 18.
author: Little Zebra Books

title: Were Wa Musafu
description: Yaliho khale were saba mwikuku. Shichira omubasu kufua, abaandu bakasia liparo mbu barusieyo Were bano. Ilali bakhola kalali habwene tawe okhula ngala itaywa ibahonia.
author: Joseph Saka

title: Namicha Baayyee Dheeraa
description: Namicha bayyee dheeraa mana isaa gadhisee bosona keessa jiraachuu jalqabe.
author: Siyane Aniley

title: Akoro's banana business
description: A story of a man who breaks all cultural believes and goes to the market to sell his bananas. Do others change their attitude towards doing such business?
author: Mele Joab

title: Katwalo, omulenzi omwende
description: Eira ghaaliyo omulenzi gwebeeta Katwalo. Baazalibwa abaana abana ni mugandawe omukulu mulala. Baamwendhanga inho.
author: Alice Gonza

title: Nkazi Wakuferwa na Mamuna  na Nyakutonga Mise
description: A parábola contado por Jesus em Lucas,  capítulo 18.
author: Little Zebra Books

title: በጣም ረጅም ሰውዬ
description: በዚህ ታሪክ ውስጥ የምናገኘው ሰውዬ በጣም ረጅም በመሆኑ በአካባቢው ያለው ነገር ሁሉ በጣም ትንሽ ወይም በጣም አጭር ሆኖበታል፡፡ እንደሱው ትላልቅ የሆኑ ነገሮችን በመስራት ለዚህ ችግሩ መፍትሔ ይፈልጋል፡፡
author: Mezemir Girma

title: Gbi Ni Moi Heba Nii
description: Moi na gbekɛ nuu ko wo atade fɛfɛo ko. Ena kulɛ eyɛ atade lɛ eko.
author: Divine Apedo (OLE Ghana)

title: Sanin Damisar Bunu
description: Bunu ya bada labarin Damisa,  dabbar da bai sani ba sosai.
author: Abubakar Saidu-Sado

title: Ikoku Nikesisilan
description: Anariet alo turkana, emiekini aberu na alosit ageor ikoku alokwap ekitoe, todoka ng'esi akiger ng'araito. Abu erotot ang'imoe toriamu ikoku eperi bon. Inyo abu ng'esi tosubea ikoku?
author: Simon Ipoo

title: Umuhigi
description: Ubusambo bwatuma ubura byose. Umuhigi yize iri somo bigoranye.
author: Niyifasha Epimaque

title: Sata ba kyau
description: The story of two thieves,  one being blind.
author: Philip Hayab John

title: ሦስቱ ጓደኛሞች
description: ጓደኝነት  የሚጠናከረው  በአንድነትና  በመተሳሰብ  ነው፡፡  ቡችላ፣ ውርዬና ጫጩት የቤት እንስሳት ናቸው፡፡
author: Mary  Jafar

title: Biashara ya Akoro ya ndizi
description: Hadithi ya mwanamaume anayefutilia mbali mila na desturi na kwenda sokoni kuuza ndizi zake. Je,  wengine wanabadili mawazo yao kuhusu kazi kama hiyo?
author: Ursula  Nafula

title: Ekhafu Yekamakana
description: A story for toddlers about a cow with daytime identity as a soft toy, but a secret night life as ‘supercow'.
author: Joseph Saka

title: Naamukhwele ni Mulipa Oothoriha
description: A parábola contado por Jesus em Lucas,  capítulo 18.
author: Little Zebra Books

title: Hamisi Be Kumu Lɛla Achɛ
description: Hamisi wu kabinyenibi ko ka buu piŋi lɛla nɛ e wɔrɔ ŋania fanɛ a daga e ka daa kɔ kukɔ.
author: Joseph Kipo Ahiah (OLE Ghana)

title: Simbegwire
description: Toe Simbegwire se ma gesterf het, het haar pa weer getrou. Simbegwire was baie ongelukkig.
author: Marguerite van Wyk

title: الرجل ذو القامة الطويلة
description: The man in this story is so tall that everything around him is too short or too small. He solves this problem by creating things to match his size.
author: Hanadi Traifeh

title: نهم ټولګی- کیمیا
description: د افغانستان د پوهنی وزارت د نصاب کتابونه

title: Nyonga, the favourite son
description: Once upon a time there lived a young boy Nyonga. He was born in a family of four with one elder brother. They all loved him so much.
author: Jemimah Mideva

title: Aku and her ice cream
description: Aku is a greedy child who learns a bitter lesson.
author: Agnes  Gyening-Asiedu

title: ሲምበግዊሬ
description: የሲምበግዊሬ እናት ከሞተች በኋላ ልጅቱና አባቷ ሁሉንም ነገር አብረው ይሰሩ ጀመር፡፡ አባትዮውም አዲስ ሚስት ለማግባት እስከፈለገበት ጊዜ ድረስም ደስተኞች ነበሩ፡፡ ሴትዮዋ ልጅቱን በደንብ አልያዘቻትም፡፡ በድላታለች፡፡ ስለዚህ ሲምበግዊሬም ከቤት ጠፋች፡፡
author: Mezemir Girma

title: Ágóbí Ázó Mbílíkó Rĩ
description: Ágobi á'dígó 'dĩ ágá rĩ ãzó mbíliko rũ, ãní áko í'dĩ ãndré gá rĩ éndré kí 'ba sínĩ ãliŋa rũ nókũ ímbĩrìŋá rũ. Ĩjó 'dĩ ãza ko jó, í'dĩ ídrígá rĩ kí édé í'bã sázĩ sĩ.
author: Driliga Yasin

title: Kawa-a Sedan Kura-A
description: Jalo fero gana bəlanja jauro cəragəna. Ngawo karmo bawanjuyen, bəla gadero bərduwu wayeno. Sedandǝ karǝndǝn kǝrga. Lamardǝn faidadiro kirawo, nasardi wa?
author: Plan Niger - Projet NECS - Usaid

title: Segokgo se se botswa
description: Botswa ga bo a siama.
author: Lorato Trok

title: Ng'akiro Nakaili-Ilok Aite Anaajokon
description: A story for toddlers about a cow with daytime identity as a soft toy,  but a secret night life as 'supercow'.
author: Alfred Esinyen

title: The Persistent Widow
description: A parable of Jesus taken from Luke 18 and set in an African context.
author: Little Zebra Books

title: Ubushiku Hamisi Ashuukile
description: Hamisi amona umulumendo naafwala ishaati ilisuma, nao aleefwaya ukukwatako limo.
author: Eunice Mukonde-Mulenga

title: Aku ne no ice cream
description: Aku yɛ abofra bi a n'ani bre adeԑ. Dakoro bi n'ani bre no annko si no yie.
author: Agnes  Gyening-Asiedu

title: Kawa-a Sedan Kura-A
description: Jalo fero gana bəlanja jauro cəragəna. Ngawo karmo bawanjuyen, bəla gadero bərduwu wayeno. Sedandǝ karǝndǝn kǝrga. Lamardǝn faidadiro kirawo, nasardi wa?
author: Plan Niger - Projet NECS - Usaid

title: Ekhaya
description: Indatjana la imayelana nomsanyana omcani  othanda ukutjala imithi ngombana kusilethela ibhoduluko elihlanzekileko. Abantu neelwane zithola ukudla, umoya kanye  nendawo yokuhlala
author: P.I Masango

title: Segwagwa Le Noga
description: Tlhamane e e re ruta gore botsala bongwe bo nale kwa bo felelang.
author: Lorato Trok

title: Etunganan Lo Awojan Noi
description: Etunganan lo ositori kalo ewoja noi ido ngin bore kere ewuriana noi araibonat edit noi. Itimokin nges ationis na ka aisomaun iboro nu iriamara keda eke saisi.
author: Betty Atima

title: Omuhepe Nomukoyesi  Wompela
description: A parábola contado por Jesus em Lucas,  capítulo 18.
author: Little Zebra Books

title: Isikipa esihlaza sakaDumi
description: UDumi ubona isikipa esihlaza satjani ngombala,  bese ufisa ngathana angaba naso naye.
author: William Jiyana

title: Ekimuli kye eirogo
description: Mukyalo ekye eyo eghla yaliyo enimiro nga mulimu ebimuli ebyeirogo ebyakozesebwanga mu ebyo bye baayendanga byonabyona. Lwali lulala,  ebimuli bya vaagho abatyamye benda ngeri mpyaka okubiiza.
author: Juliet Namugaya

title: Ilanga lakaSizwe letjhudu
description: USizwe ubona umsana owembethe irhembe ehle,  bewafisa kwangathi naye angaba nalo.
author: Phephelaphi Mnguni

title: Sekolo Lešokeng
description: Diphoofolo tša lešokeng di thabetše sekolo sa bona se seswa. Efela, ba ile ba se sa thaba ge ba bona gore morutiši wa bona ke mang!
author: Motlhago Sara Mohale

title: Murume akarebesa
description: Murume ari munyaya iyi murefu zvekuti zvinhu zvese zvipfupi kwaari.
author: Ephraim Mhlanga

title: Tselane en die Reus
description: Tselane se ma wou na 'n ander dorpie toe trek,  maar Tselane wou nie saamgaan nie. Haar ma stem later in dat sy alleen kan bly.
author: Fanie Viljoen

title: سمبقواير
description: توفيت أم سمبقواير، فحزنت البنت حزنا شديدا. فعل أبوها كل ما في وسعه للعناية بها، فبدآ رويدا رويدا يسترجعان معا شعورهما بالفرح رغم غياب الأم. كانا يجلسان كل صباح ويتناقشان فيما سيفعلانه خلال اليوم. وفي المساء، كانا يحضران العشاء معا ويغسلان الأطباق ثم يقوم أب سمبقواير بمساعدتها في القيام بفروضها المنزلية
author: Maaouia Haj Mabrouk

title: A Visita Do Neymar a África
description: Uma descrição imaginária da visita do futebolista Neymar da Silva Santos a países africanos para demonstrar certas habilidades futebolísticas.
author: Translators without Borders

title: Kaudha in bbalaafu we
description: Obukodo obw'o mwana Kaudha bwamwegeresa eisomo.
author: peter kyawera

title: Imini Yethamsanqa Likahamisi
description: Hamisi sees a boy at the market wearing an attractive green shirt. Will Hamisi be able to persuade his father to buy him the same shirt?
author: Nokuthula Bernelee Dyonase

title: Jal Ma Bor Tektek
description: Nyicwo moro oyido bor ma kinyal oro gi kipiny makis ndelo. Won oyiko kosa onywewo gi kipiny ma ripo gi boro pere.
author: Athieno Gertrude

title: Sekolo Lešokeng
description: Diphoofolo tša lešokeng di be di thabetše sekolo sa tšona se seswa. Efela, lethabo le ile la fela ge ba lemoga gore morutiši wa bona ke mang!
author: Motlhago Sara Mohale

title: Simbegwire
description: After Simbegwire's mother died, she and her father did everything together. They were happy until Simbegwire's father wanted to marry a new wife. This woman treats the girl badly, and Simbegwire runs away from home.
author: Rukia Nantale

title: The Magic Flower
description: In a far away village there was a field with magic flowers which have been used by the inhabitants for all they needed. One day,  the flowers dissaper and the inhabitants need to find new ways to bring them back.
author: andriana santiago

title: Tselane and the giant
description: After Tselane's father died her mother wanted them to move to another village to start a new life. But Tselane didn't want to go,  and her mother agreed to let her stay on her own.
author: Lorato Trok

title: Aku Hulu Feelɔ lɛ
description: Gbekɛ yoo ko ni akwa na naanyo ko ni aleee,  ni amɛyi enyɔ lɛ kɛ hekanyamɔ kɛ miishɛɛ ba emaŋ lɛ mli.
author: Aisha  Nelson

title: Ekinhonhi Ekigonzebwa
description: Ekinhonhi ekigonzewa kyemba obwembo obusenhenkerevu.
author: Juliet Namugaya

title: Sekolo Sa Murung
description: The animals in the jungle rush to the new school with great enthusiasm. But they are not enthusiastic when they see who their new teacher is.
author: Moeketsi Buku

title: Imini kaHamisi yamathamsanqa
description: UHamisi ubona inkwenkwe enxibe ihempe entle aze anqwenele ukuba nayo naye.
author: Xolisa Guzula

title: Neymar Se Besoek Aan Afrika
description: Neymar se Besoek aan Afrika. Hy maak klomp besoeke aan plekke in Afrika. Hy moet dan in elke area wat hy kom, een van sy sokker talente aan die mense van die omgewing wys.
author: Annerijke Claassen

title: Jal Ma Bor Tektek
description: Jal ma nitye i kigana me bori tektek makisi gi moro muthoko go cek swa ri go.
author: Hellen Alowo

title: Simbi's new mother
description: After Simbi's mother dies,  she and her father manage to live together happily until her father marries another wife.
author: African Storybook

title: Tselane Et Le Giant
description: Tselane est une petite fille qui aime beaucoup son village. Après le décès de son père, elle refuse de déménager dans un autre village. Le géant qui habite dans les environs tente de profiter de la situation, va-t-il réussir?
author: Isabelle Duston et Véronique Biddau

title: Aku the Sun Maker
description: A dejected girl finds an unlikely friend and together,  they bring life and joy to her town. (This story was created at a Story Making Workshop in Abuja,  2018,  co-hosted by African Storybook and the British Council Nigeria).
author: Aisha  Nelson

title: Rwendo rwa Neymar kuAfrica
description: Mufananidzo wekuuya kwemutambi wenhabvu anonzi Neymar da Silva Santos kunyika dzemuAfrica kuzoratidza unyanzvi hwekutambwa kwenhabvu.
author: Lilian Chaminuka

title: Omonto omotambe mono
description: Omonto oyo ore ase omogano oyo nigoare omontambe mono na ase igo keregento nigokere ekieng'e na egeke asare. Omonto oyo nigo agotatora obokong'u goetera ase okoreng'ania ebinto bionsi bimoreng'ane.
author: Gladys Nyachieo

title: Sekolo sa sethokgweng
description: Diphoofolo tše ntsi le dinonyana di be dula sethokgweng.
author: Maphokane Mapule Mohlamme

title: The lovely  Bird
description: The lovely bird that sings sweet melodies.
author: Namusisi Vicky Kirabo

title: Tselane Et Le Géant
description: Tselane est une petite fille qui aime beaucoup son village. Après le décès de son père, elle refuse de déménager dans un autre village. Le géant qui habite dans les environs tente de profiter de la situation, va-t-il réussir?
author: Isabelle Duston et Véronique Biddau

title: Usuku lukaHamisi lwenhlanhla
description: UHamisi ubona umfana ogqoke ihembe elihle,  bese efisa ukuba nalo naye.
author: Pumla Mdontswa

title: Wawuda mkandee
description: Wawuda na ndee wakaie na sere imbiri ndee uselowue mka mzima.
author: Martha Mkanyika

title: A very tall man
description: The man in this story is so tall that everything around him is too short or too small. He solves this problem by creating things to match his size.
author: Cornelius Wambi Gulere

title: Ekinonhi Namaadhi
description: Eira yaliyo ekinonhi ekirungi,  eyo mu kibira munda,  ekinonhi ekyagwisanga amaadhi. Aye abantu baali balekeire okwikiririza mu kinonhi kino,  era nga tibakaakirabirira. Endhala eyaamaanhi yagwa,  okutuusa akaghala kalala,  nga kaidhukira daadha waako,  bwekaaja mu kibira okunoonia ekinonhi namaadhi kakiwe emere kirye.
author: Kyambogo  University

title: Atieno's friend
description: A young girl finds it difficult to associate with other children in the village. She turns to the sun for comfort. (This story was created at a Story Making Workshop in Abuja,  2018,  co-hosted by African Storybook and the British Council Nigeria).
author: African Storybook

title: Hamisi  Yuu-Ywoŋo Dɛ
description: Hamisi nɛ bakeira na lɛ gɔr-lao ye o de lage kodwoŋe.
author: Joseph Kandwe (OLE Ghana)

title: Sekuru Mkuku
description: Farai,  mukomana wemuguta,  haana kufara vabereki vake pavakamuendesa kumusha kuna sekuru nambuya vake pazororo Asi pakazopera zororo,  Farai akanga asandura pfungwa.
author: Lilian  Chaminuka

title: Neymar's Visit to Africa
description: An imaginary description of footballer Neymar da Silva Santos' visit to African countries to demonstrate specific soccer skills.
author: Benard Agasi

title: Simbi ampata mama mpya
description: Baada ya mamake Simbi kufa,  yeye na babake waliweza kuishi pamoja kwa furaha hadi babake alipooa mke mwingine.
author: Ursula Nafula

title: Teselan E Jiyan
description: Teselan no suka debbo jiɗuɗo wuro muuɗum. Caggal maayde abbiiko, o salii eggirde wuro gooɗom. Guuturuwa ngan tawaanga nder. Caggal maayde abbiiko, o salii eggirde wuro gooɗom. Guuturuwa tawaanga nder nokkuuje ɗen no filoo ko waɗata, nga heɓan wune?
author: Plan Niger - Projet NECS - Usaid

title: Inshuti ya Keza
description: Umukobwa ukiri muto byaramugoye kwisanzura mu bandi bana mu mudugudu. Yahisemo kwiyotera akazuba kugira ngo abyakire.
author: Jean Paul Harelimana

title: La Visite De Neyman en Afrique
description: Une description imaginaire de la visite du footballeur Neyman da Silva Santos pour démontrer les compétences spécifiques liées au soccer.
author: Binek Muriel

title: Sekuru Mkuku
description: Farai,  a city boy,  was unhappy when his parents sent him on holiday to his grandparents in the rural areas. But by the end of the holiday,  he had changed his mind.
author: Blessing Nemadziva

title: The Rain Bird
description: Once long ago there lived a beautiful bird deep in the forest, a bird that made the rain fall. But people no longer believed in this bird, and stopped taking care of it. There was a terrible drought in the land, until one little girl remembering her grandmother, went into the forest to find the rain bird and give it food to eat.
author: Joanne Bloch (retold folktale)

title: Thimba to the rescue!
description: Thimba asks the villagers to help Gobani the Gentle Giant by making things the right size for him.
author: Penelope Smith

title: Tselane Da Ƙato
description: Tselani wata ƴar yarinya ce mai ƙamnar ƙauyensu. Bayan rasuwar ma'aifinta sai ta ƙi komawa cikin wani ƙauyen. Babban mutumen da yake kusa da ita yana son ya yi amfani da halin da take ci,  za ya samun nasara?
author: Plan Niger - Projet NECS - Usaid

title: Umunsi W'amahirwe Kuri Mugabo
description: Mugabo yabonye umwana wambaye ishati nziza, na we yifuza kugira ishati nk'iyo.
author: Emmanuel Sibomana

title: Yìy à Simbi wo fiy
description: Yìy à Simbi kpù,  wùn tàr wov kú a mùm a dzə kijuŋ,  e dù e meé mo tàr wov tàʼàn wiíy wùmòʼ.
author: Beatrice Tafon Takeh

title: (Colour-in) A very tall man
description: The man in this story is so tall that everything around him is too short or too small. He solves this problem by creating things to match his size.
author: Ingrid Schechter

title: Ekirabo kya dhaadha omukazi
description: Maama abeeraku Nangobi okukola ekiraba kya dhaadhawe ekyendhawulo.
author: Alice Gonza

title: Aku, rafikiye Jua
description: Msichana mmoja mpweke anapata rafiki wa ajabu,  na pamoja,  wanaleta furaha na maisha katika kijiji kimoja. (Hadithi hii iliandikwa katika Waksha iliyoandaliwa Abuja,  Nigeria,  2018 kwa ushirikiano kati ya African Storybook na British Council).
author: Ursula  Nafula

title: Hamisi abahatika
description: Hamisi alipokuwa akinunua sare ya shule na babake,  alimwona mvulana aliyevaa shati la kijanikiwiti la kuvutia. Je,  Hamisi atafaulu kumshawishi babake kumnunulia shati kama hilo?
author: Adelheid Marie Bwire

title: Sello Sa Seeta
description: Kanegelo ka sello sa seeta.
author: Ephasia Ramohlale

title: Neymar Ma Emu Taa Afrika Ri
description: Eyo egaza ecezu agu mupira avipi bani omvele Neymar da Silva Santos ma emuta kari ndu ndu Afrika ri ma alea ondua ndu ndu mupira avi zudiyii ecezu.
author: Benard Agasi

title: Tasalla Nda Gorza
description: Tasalla wo wandiyo kayna fo no kaŋ ga ba ngey kwaaraa gumo. Baabo buuyaŋo banda, a wangu ga ɲaŋo gana ga dira kwaaraa ra. Kwaaraa banda borey ba ngey ma ŋwa. A ga te ?
author: Plan Niger - Projet NECS - Usaid

title: Sibahwana
description: Nyina ya Sibahwana ni gafa, niye ni semwana baholanga hiisi hiitu ni bali bombi era ni bali basangaafu. Aye semwana ni gasuna omuhasi, n''gomuhasi oyo atagiha ohubonyabonya Sibahwana. Lulala semwana ni gatiina mu lugendo gamulehaŋo ni nyina oyo muha semwana, gamubisya bubi bugali ohwola olu gaduluma ŋango. Ni gaduluma ŋango gaja ŋe…?
author: Enoch Wandera

title: UTselane nesigebenga
description: Le yintsomi engentombazana uTselane owayethanda ilali akhulele kuyo kakhulu. Kuthe kwakusweleka utata wakhe,  unina wafuna bafudukele kwenye ilali bayoqala ubomi obutsha khona. UTselane wayengafuni nokuva ngolu daba,  wade umama wakhe wanikezela wavuma ukuba ashiyeke yedwa lo gama yena efudukela kwenye ilali. Benza isivumelwano sokuba umama wakhe uzakumzisela ukutya mihla le. Kwakufuneka uTselane ahlale etixile emnyango ukuze amizim ayexhaphakile kulo lali angangeni. Wayalwa ukuba avule umnyango xa esiva ingoma kamama wakhe ekhethekileyo. Akubanga kudala izim lafumanisa ukuba uTselane uhlala yedwa,  lenza icebo lokuba lingene endlini limthathe liye naye emqolombeni walo. Ingaba lizakuphumelela eli zim kweli yelenqe lalo?
author: Ntombizodwa Gxowa-Dlayedwa

title: Sidney's Dream
description: Sidney is a little girl with a big dream. She always wanted to visit the circus since she read a story about circus animals. In a dream she came across a few animals, each leaving her amazed. When she wake up she discover that reality is exactly like her dream.
author: Maryke Du Randt

title: Tuseerana ni Naiwano
description: Bbaabba wa Tuseerana bweyafa,  maama we yayenda baje mu kyalo ekindhi batoolere obulamu obuyaaka. Aye Tuseerana tiyayenda kuja,  kale maama we yaamuganha asigale yenka.
author: Kyambogo  University

title: Ekirooto  kya  Guligula
description: Olufumo lwa Guligula Maliya,  n'ekirooto kye ekimupikiriza okusoma n'okweega mu baana abe Mozambiki n'aghasigaire ku lukalu olw'Omwirugavu. Ekitabo kino kinakupukirizaaki okukola?
author: Bakali Kasolo

title: Maama wa'Simba omuyaaka
description: Oluvainhuma lwa'maama wa'Simba okufa,  baasobola okuba ni'latawe mw'isanhu okutuusa ise bwe yafuna omukazi owundi.
author: Kyambogo  University

title: Un Homme Très Grand
description: Cette histoire raconte la vie d'un homme si grand que tout ce qui l'entoure est trop court ou trop petit. Il résout ce problème en créant des choses, qui correspondent à sa taille.
author: Isabelle Duston et Véronique Biddau

title: Nayima akyalira olukalu lwa afirika
description: Okufumintiriza okwinonhola Nayima da siliva santos nga akyalilie ku afirika okwolesa obukodyo bwo mupiira obutayaganibwa.
author: Francis  Bananwa

title: Olunaku lwa Kanusu olw'omukisa
description: Kanusu abona omulenzi mukatalenga ayambailre esaati eyakilagala enhungi. Kanusu anasobola okudwadwamiriza ise okumugulira esaati nga eyo?
author: Juliet Namugaya

title: Rafiki ya Atieno
description: Msichana mmoja ampata rafiki wa ajabu na anafurahia maisha kwa njia ya kipekee.
author: Ursula  Nafula

title: Sifikil' ezibukweni
description: Le yingoma yabantwana yesiXhosa efumaneka kwincwadi ethi 'Songs Sung by South African Children' (1990,  1992 and 2002) edidiyelwe yi Grassroots Adult Education and Training Trust.
author: Liz Brouckaert

title: ሃፍቲ ዝሓዘ ሰለስተ ሰናዱቕ
description: ኣቦይ ሓጎስ ዝተብሃሉ ዓብዪ ወላዲ ምስ ሰለስተ ደቆም ነበሩ፡፡ ቅድሚ ሙሟቶም ዘለዎም ሃፍቲ ንደቆም ከውርስዎም ደለዩ እሞ ሰለስተ ሰናዱቕ ነንሕድሕድኦም ኣዳለዉሎም፡፡
author: ሰለሙን

title: Ask a Teacher: Sorry and Excuse Me
Graca's dream
description: The inspiring story of Graca Machel,  and her dream to instill a love for reading and learning in the children of Mozambique and the rest of Africa. What will this book inspire you to do?
author: Melissa Fagan

title: Mukwano gwa Atieno
description: Omuwala omuto asanga obuzibu okukwatagana na'baana abalala mu kyaalo. Akyukira omusana okufuna okukubagiza. (Olugero luno lwa'tondebwa ku lusirika olutonda obugero mu Abuja,  nkumi bbiri mu kumina munaana,  ne'kyanirizibwa ekitongole kya'bafirika ekyo'butabo no'lukiiko lwa'bangereza mu Nayigeria).
author: Ajuna David

title: Hamisi Zugsuŋŋu Dabsiri
description: Zugusuƞƞu veella
author: Midzira Charles

title: Tselane Le Limo
description: Ena ke tsómo ea Tselane ea holelang motseng oa habao oo a o ratang haholo. Ha ntate oa hae a qeta ho hlokahala, ena le ‘Me oa hae ba lokela ke ho fallela motseng o mong empa Tselane ha battle ho tsameaa ho hang. Tselane o lumellana le ‘Me oa hae hore o tla mo tlisetsa lijo hosing ho hong le hong empa Tselane a bule menyako feela ha a utloa ‘Me oa hae a bina pina hobane ha a battle Tselane a jeoe ke Malimo. Lelimo le loha leqheka la ho utsoa Tselane mme la balehe ka eena. Na Limo o leqheka la hae le tla sebetsa?
author: Lorato Trok

title: Orubungo Rwa Neyma Mu Afirika
description: Orubazo orucwereriirwe owa Omuzaani w'Omupiira Neyma da Silver Santos obuyabungiire amahanga g'Afirika kwoleka obukodyo bwo kusamba omupiira.
author: Musinguzi Moses

title: Un Très Grand Bonhomme
description: Le personnage de cette histoire est si grand qu'autour de lui tout est trop court, trop bas ou trop petit. Il résout ce problème en fabriquant des objets qui correspondent à sa taille.
author: Nathalie Hecker

title: Sifun' itshom' am
description: Le yingoma yabantwana yesiXhosa efumaneka kwincwadi ethi 'Songs Sung by South African Children' (1990,  1992 and 2002) edidiyelwe yi Grassroots Adult Education and Training Trust.
author: Liz Brouckaert

title: Poisonous Spiders
description: This reading describes the effects of poisonous spiders on humans.
publisher: Shahid Beheshti University of Medical Science

title: Ekeny Ka Hamisi
description: Aminarito ng'iworui lukaalak Hamisi.Nakaneni ali eseuni ng'esi?
author: Lolupe teachers

title: Three boxes of wealth
description: A father leaves each of his sons an inheritance that best suits his talents.(This story was created at a teacher workshop in Adwa,  Ethiopia,  2017,  with Imagine1Day.).
author: Angesom Abadi

title: Mukwano  gwa  Kampi
description: Omughala ayagaana obuzibu okugemagana ni baine mu kyalo. Akyukira Endhuba emubeseegho. Olufumo luno lwatondebwawo ku musomo ogwali mu Abuja,  ogwagenighazibwa ku lukalu lw'omwirugavu olugema ku kitabo ky'enfumo n'olukiiko lwa Bungereza e Nigeriya. Dejected girl finds an unlikely friend and together,  they bring life and joy to her town. (This story was created at a Story Making Workshop in Abuja,  2018,  co-hosted by African Storybook and the British Council Nigeria).
author: Bakali Kasolo

title: Gorko Mawnuɗo Sanne
description: Taariko oo no fillo dow nguurdam niɗɗo mawɗo mo huunde fuu no raɓɓiɗi e no famɗi sanne hadde muuɗum. Imo jiɓita jiɓoore ndee nder tagol kujje jahdooje e juundam makko.
author: Plan Niger - Projet NECS - Usaid

title: Ndoto ya Graca
description: Hadithi ya Graca Machel na ndoto yake ya kueneza umuhimu wa watoto wa Musumbiji na Afrika nzima kujifunza kusoma. Hadithi hii itaamsha ari gani kwako?
author: Rebbeccah Karoki

title: Tselane le dimo
description: Mmagwe Tselane o dira leano la go pholosa morwadie.
author: Lorato Trok

title: Neymar's U Dalela Africa
description: Neymar u dalela mashango o fhambananaho a Africa a tshi sumbedza zwikili zwo fhambananaho zwa bola.
author: Acherlager Lesedi Milanzi

title: A Wise Crow
description: the crow that went for searching water
author: Beatres Nabune

title: Akwaar Kang Na Eking'aren Alomaket
description: Arai Etabo edia lo angikaru angikankapei,abu itokeng ka eyakeng torikosi ngesi lomakit agialakin Ikeny.
author: Lolupe teachers

title: Sikhatsi Semaholide
description: Lendzaba imayelana nentfombatanyane libito layo lekungu Mimi .Tivaliwe tikolwa Mimi utfokote kakhulu njengoba aya kuyovakashela gogo wakhe lamugcina kadzeni .
author: Nonduduzo Saint Maziya

title: Ekiroto kya Kisakye
description: Olufumo olusikiriza olwa Kisakye Makere,  n'e kiroto kya mwendesa inho okusoma mubaana ab'o mu Muzambiiki ni bitundu ebindi ebyomu Afirika. Iwe ekitabo kino kinakusikiriza kitya?
author: Kyambogo  University

title: Goɗɗo Juutuɗo Soosey
description: Fuu ko taarii goɗɗo oʼo juutuɗo ɗum dammuɗum ammaa o haɓdii o heɓaniiɗum darnde.
author: Abdoulaye  Adamou Bappa

title: Line plots
description: Learn how to read and make line plots.

title: Hamisi Kenle Kpalɛ
description: Hamisi nwunle kɛ kakula nrnya bie wula anwuma tɛladeɛ kɛlɛma bie na ɔkunlu bie a anrɛɛ ɔlε ko.
author: Susana Ackah (OLE Ghana)

title: Udukarito dutatu tw'ubukire
description: Umubyeyi yasigiye abana be umurage ubakwiriye bitewe n' impano zabo.
author: Jean Paul Harelimana

title: Silly Sizwe
description: Sizwe goes to work at the Chief's house but keeps making silly mistakes!  Will his mistakes ever make the Chief's daughter laugh?
author: Val Morris

title: Kayanga Da Gyanɗama
description: Kayanga ta yi rishin ma'aifanta,  amma sun bara mata gadon wata gyaɗama da wani laƙani. Da wannan gyanɗamar kamar tana tare da ma'aifan nata ne,  amma wata rana,  sai gyanɗamar ta fashe.
author: Plan Niger - Projet NECS - Usaid

title: Arthropods
description: This resource describes the characteristics of arthropods.

title: Dia De Sorte Do Hamisi
description: Hamisi vê um menino vestindo uma camisa bonita, e gostaria que ele tivesse uma também.
author: Translators without Borders

title: Ekiseera Ky'oluwumula
description: Olugero luno lwogera kukiseera eky'oluwumula n'engeri jekyeyagazaamu.
author: Nansamba Martha

title: Masanduku matatu yenye mali
description: Baba anaachia kila mmoja wa wanawe watatu urithi ambao unamfaa kila mmoja wao kulingana na vipaji walivyo navyo. (Hadithi hii iliandikwa wakati wa waksha ya walimu huko Adwa,  Ethiopia,  2017.).
author: Ursula Nafula

title: Igisiga K'igihanga
description: Igisiga cyagiye gushaka amazi. (ku riba).
author: Niyifasha Epimaque

title: My Eerste Dag By Die Markie
description: On Etabo's sixth birthday, his mother and aunt take him to a faraway town to visit the market for the first time. At the market he has an adventure which eventually ends with a wonderful birthday present.
author: Madri Janse van Rensburg

title: Nuu Kakadaŋŋ Ko
description: Nuu kakadaŋŋ ko tao bɔni eeefee ni ehi shi tamɔ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ.
author: Aisha  Nelson

title: Kaza Da Shanshani
description: Kaza da shanshani suna takara kullum tsakaninsu. Wata rana kaza da ba ta ci nasara ba,  ta yi wani abin kumya.
author: Plan Niger - Projet NECS - Usaid

title: Ask a Teacher: How to Say the Letter 'I'

description: I ayenga iwe okoba ki? Memale bino biva ighaku?
author: Bishop Willis CPTC Student Teachers

title: Simon Peter and Andrew his brother
description: The two brothers,  Simon Peter and Andrew were brothers. They were fishermen. They were called by Jesus to follow Him. How could they leave their job?
author: Cornelius Wambi Gulere

title: Bokisi edho obugaiga
description: Bbaabba yalekara buli mu tabanhe ebyo obusika ebigwana mu talanta dhaibwe.
author: Kyambogo  University

title: Kiseera kya lughuumula
description: Olufumo luno luyogera ku kiseera kya lughuumula ne ngeri ye kyeyagazaamu abaghuumuze.
author: Emmanuel  Kunya

title: Budaa N Ba'am Wↄgε
description: Budaa la n boi solene la puan la kↄ‘ↄm ba'am wↄgε mε gaŋε ti nεra woo n lem e kↄ'ↄm ana la girega bii pika. A sɛla woo iti ti la zͻna la a woko la.
author: Samuel Awinkene Atintono

title: Letšatši la Kagiso la mahlatse
description: Kagiso o bona mošimane a apere hempe ye botse mme o rata eka a ka ba le yona.
author: Motlhago Sara Mohale

title: My Eerste Dag by die Mark
description: On Etabo's sixth birthday,  his mother and aunt take him to a faraway town to visit the market for the first time. At the market he has an adventure which eventually ends with a wonderful birthday present.
author: Marisa Kruger

title: Sindiwe and the Fireflies
description: There once was a girl named Sindiwe Magona.  She had a special gift for stories. At night, little Sindiwe's grandmother told her magical stories about ogres and giants, animals of the forests, and the little creatures of the veld. This was Sindiwe's favourite time.  See how she grows up to live out her own adventures as she travels over oceans to change the world with her stories.
author: Cheréne Pienaar

title: ለባም ኳኽ
description: ለባም ንዘጋጠሞ ፀገም ብልሓት ፈጢሩ ከምዝፈትሕ የረድእ፡፡ (This story was developed at a teacher workshop in Adwa,  Ethiopia in 2017,  with Imagine1Day)
author: ሰለሙን  ግደይ

title: EKITAASUUBIRWA!
description: Olufumo luno lugema ku musaadha eyasookera mu bughafu einho,  aye oluvainhuma yaafuuka kyabazinga ate nga mukombe inho.
author: David  Bamukangwiire

title: Empungu y'obwengye
description: Empungu y'obwengye ekaza kuronda amaizi.
author: KANGABE EDNA

title: Wani Mutum Mai Ƙirma
description: Wannan labarin wani babban mutum ne wanda duk abin da yake kewaye da shi ƙarami ne kuma gajere ne. Sai ya ciyo kan matsalar ta hanyar ƙera abubuwan da suka yi daidai da tsayinshi.
author: Plan Niger - Projet NECS - Usaid

title: Kaza Da Shanshani
description: Kaza da shanshani suna takara kullum tsakaninsu. Wata rana kaza da ba ta ci nasara ba,  ta yi wani abin kumya.
author: Plan Niger - Projet NECS - Usaid

title: Letsatsi la Tshepo la lehlohonolo
description: Tshepo o bona moshanyana ya apereng hempe e ntle,  mme o lakatsa ho ba le yona le yena.
author: Tseliso Masolane

title: My first day at the market
description: On Etabo's sixth birthday,  his mother and aunt take him to town to visit the market for the first time.
author: Timothy Kabare

title: Kùrti Il-Ħamra
description: Kùra ħamra kbira tsèfir l'bġìd.
author: Ramzi Hachani

title: Rainbows
description: This storybook introduces students to the colours of a rainbow.

title: Sipho Nasihlahla
description: Sipho naSihlahla yindzaba yabantfwana belibanga lesibili kuFoundation phase. Lendzaba ikhuluma ngaSipho naSihlahla, kulendzaba sitfola Sipho ahlangabetene nebumatima bekuswelakala kwemali yekutsenga emazenke yekufulela indlu yakhe kanye nemali yekuyisa bantfwana eskolweni. Sipho utfolakala asitwa nguSihlahla ngekumnika emagala akhe.
author: Forget Khoza

title: Ekitabo kyaife
description: Twali bangi. Twakola ekitakoleka. Twakuba footo bwe tuzaanha.
author: Cornelius Wambi Gulere

title: Empungu yamagyezi
description: Empungu ekagira eruhu ryamani yagyenda orugyendo rureigwa neronda amaizi kwonka gabura.
author: Emmanuel  Buryo

title: Letsatsi la ga Hamisi la letlhogonolo
description: Hamisi o bona mosimane a apere hempe e ntle mme o eletsa ekare a ka nna le yone.
author: Lorato Trok

title: Batteries, Circuits and Transformers
description: This resource explains how batteries produce electricity.

title: How I got lost at the market
description: A boy is promised a wonderful present on his sixth birthday. Find out what happened.
author: African Storybook

title: Mutum Mai Tsawo Sosai
description: Duk abinda ke kewaye da wannan mutum mai tsawo duk gajeru ne,  amma ya yi kokari ya samar da masu tsawo.
author: Muhammad Umar

title: Raven and Fox
description: Who is cleverer - the raven or the fox? (This story was developed at a teacher workshop in Adwa,  Ethiopia in 2017,  with Imagine1Day.).
author: Angesom Abadi

title: A-Citagamulo na a-Kalunga
description: A Mozambican folktale about how Chameleon outwits his rival,  Rabbit.
author: Little Zebra Books

title: Ke rata go bala
description: Ye ke kanegelo kopana ka ya mosemane wa go rata go bala dikanegelo. O rata go bala kudu ka fao a rata go anegela ba le lapa la gabo ka kanegelo yeo a e badilego.
author: Letta Machoga

title: Wani Dogon Mutum
description: Mutumin dogo ne ƙwarai,  ya kasance duk abin da ke kewaye da shi yana zama tamkar gajere ne ko ƙarami. Yana magance wannan matsalar ta hanyar yin abubuwa daidai da tsawon sa.

description: Lingiri nde ‘ba nyakua ‘diyi ma okpo dria ra. Otukolia eco nga eri nde ra?
author: Enzata Francis

title: Sisyutse Sye'Tsala Ni Kamatsangwali Kamalulu
description: Sisyutse sye ‘tsala sinyoola kumukunda kwebibyano nga mulimu kamatsangwali kamarobe katsungatsunga khu lusaca. Sisyutse syesuta nio sibute kamatsangwali ne syemuula haasi makalama.Syakhakakho khu khwisutiila ilaala mu ngaaki kimirundi kimikali,ngabuli mbuka simuuliila ilaala haasi makalama.Wambasa uri sikhanyalise khubuta kamatsangwali?
author: Aryada Naomi Nora

title: Obulamu bwange
description: Ebigema ku basulube mu Yuganda. Engeri gyebebisa mu.
author: Francis  Bananwa

title: Funny story
description: Meet some unusual animals and people in this unusual story!
author: Khothatso Ranoosi

title: Ikahipi?
description: Help two friends find the hidden animals.
author: Little Zebra Books

title: Jumamosi Moja
description: Jumamosi moja alasiri watoto watatu wanaenda kucheza karibu na mto. Wanapotaka kwenda nyumbani tena,  hawazipati nguo zao. Watajielezaje kwa mamao?
author: Ursula Nafula

title: Tomu omutunzi w'amenvu
description: A man goes against community norms and brings his bananas to sell at the market.
author: Samson  Nabbimba

title: Wampiti, Wakaima, ne'bafu  dhaibwe
description: Oba ebafu ezala,  eba nga nnamu. Aye buli kilamu kisobola okufa.
author: Rebecca Masabe

title: Kyagaba ni Kateme e puusi
description: Emboozi egemagana nho mulenzi ayenda inho ebisolo bye ebito mbu yaibye amata ga ko. Maama ghe yagoba akapuusi.
author: Victor  Muwanguzi

title: Tom Omutundi W'amalafu
description: Tom omutundi w'amalafu.
author: Bukheye Mulongo Christopher

title: Ebuu, Apoo Ka Ng'atubwae
description: Kwana euriya atubwa,  erai ng'esi ibore ni eyari. Etwakete ng'iboro daang lu eyarete.
author: Simon Ipoo

title: O'Du Azia Alu Driipi Tu Ondresi Ri
description: On a very hot Saturday afternoon, three girls go off to play next to the river. Even though they are not allowed to swim, they soon strip and spend the afternoon splashing and having fun. When they want to go home again, they can't find their clothes. What could have happened to their skirts and shirts? How would they explain themselves to their parents?
author: Saidi Omar Dramani

title: Ehibbwe Ehiyala N'amapeera Agajujuma
description: Ehibbwe ehiyala higwirihirira omupeera oguliho ehisaganda hy' amapeera amalabire nigalereja hulusaga.
author: Gershom Hirome

title: Artist Gives 80s Hit ‘Africa’ Permanent Desert Home
Onde Está?
description: Help two friends find the hidden animals.
author: Little Zebra Books

title: Ibali elihlekisayo
description: Ibali ngabantu nezilwanyana ezingaqhelekanga.
author: Sonwabile Mayekiso

title: Otukolia fights Lingiri
description: Lingiri the monster overcomes all the people on earth. Will Otukolia be able to defeat the monster?
author: Enzata Francis

title: A'Ugbe A'Ugbea
description: Sentences with photographs of yellow everyday objects.
author: Angunduyo Milly

title: Elinkahi?
description: Yamba abanyni babili kufuna enyamaisha eyeshelekyile.
author: Tumanye Clinton

title: Toomu omutunzi gha amenvu
description: Omusaadha amenha obulombolombo bwe ekiketezo kye bwe yaleeta amatooke okutana mu katale.
author: Cornelius Mugulusi

title: یولسم ټولګی- انګلیسی
description: د افغانستان د پوهنی وزارت د نصاب کتابونه

title: Lule and Kitty the Cat
description: It is a story about a boy who loves his pet so much that he steals milk for it. His mother chases the cat away.
author: Flavia Kunihira

title: Walube Omuyala Ne Miziru Emika
description: Walube omuyala ayagaana ekifangata kye minimaawa kili kulengeedhera ku lusaga. Alisobola okutuuka ku miziru gino?
author: Cornelius Wambi Gulere

title: O'dú Ázɨ́á Má Òndré Àngù Nɨ́ Drɨzʉ́ Tù Rɨ̀
description: O'dú àlʉ, o'du àzɨ́á mà òndré àzɨ́ àngʉ̀ nɨ́ drɨzʉ́ tʉ̀ nɨ sɨ̀, anzɨ na mu kí avɨ́ yí àra mà tiá. 'Bánɨ́ té  tró ogazʉ́ yɨ nɨ́ yí wèzʉ́ sɨ̀ rá tí,  sâ were vútiá  òtrʉ̌ bongo rá cotí e'dó yǐ òyǎ yɨ mà ruá. Yɨ nɨ́ lèzʉ́ mvɨ́zʉ́ àkúá rɨ̀sɨ̀ esú nɨ́ yɨ vɨ́lé bòngó kʉ. Yɨ nga e'yó 'dɨ̀ ecé yɨ mà àndraî nɨ́ ngónɨ ngónɨ?
author: Dorothy Fetaru

title: Oruganikyo orukusekesa
description: Rora ebisoro na bantu abatalibabulikkiroo mu ru orutali orwabulikiro.
author: Timothy Tyron Bananuka

title: Phiri, Mmutla Le Dijana
description: Fa sejana se kgona go belega,  go raya gore se a tshela. Dilo tsotlhe tse di tshelang di kgona go swa.
author: Lorato Trok

title: Allons Nager
description: Serpent apprend à nager et manque de se noyer. Heureusement que Tortue sait ce qu'il faut faire.

title: US Carbon Emissions Rise in 2018 Because of Industry, Fuel Demand
Kyebandule
description: Omulimi we embooli ku kyalo yali mukozi. Okulima tikyamulobera kukola milimo gindi.
author: Cornelius Wambi Gulere

title: Epeot Lo Anyamit Akoro Ka Ng'Apedur Nakaabarak
description: Eng'olikini epeot lo anyamit akoro amana na ayei ekito lo enenotor ng'apedur nakokito anatine. Abu epeot topor arutun ng'apedur na kaneni abu kikumakin todo alogur. Abu tamamak aporopor na kaneni abu ng'esi kikumanakin noi todo alogur. Epedori ng'esi aanyun ng'apedur a?
author: Dennis Lokitare

title: Lihaangilwe Lye Lwa Khasesaba Lutweela Lweesi Kumuumu Kwaaburukhila Naabi
description: On a very hot Saturday afternoon, three girls go off to play next to the river. Even though they are not allowed to swim, they soon strip and spend the afternoon splashing and having fun. When they want to go home again, they can't find their clothes. What could have happened to their skirts and shirts? How would they explain themselves to their parents?
author: Cornelius Wekunya

title: Tom, O Vendedor De Bananas
description: Um homem vai contra as regras da sua comunidade e leva bananas para vender no mercado.
author: Translators without Borders

title: Pale E Qabolang
description: Pale e buang ka liphoofolo tse qabolang.
author: Khothatso Ranoosi

title: Yellow
description: Sentences with photographs of yellow everyday objects.
author: Reviva Schermbrucker

title: Allons-Y!
description: Quelques phrases sur l'expérience des sens: sentir, goûter, voir et toucher.

title: Can Satellites Help Identify Extreme Poverty?
Labarin mai gona da mai akuya
description: The story of the farmer of the goat,  which eat the farm produce of a farm.
author: Philip Hayab John

title: Ehy'egulo Hu Lw'omukaaga Olwaliho Ebbugumu
description: Olugano lw'abaana abatiina e lwabi ohw'ebbomba. Banyumirwa nyo bebirira nti balehire engoye jawe hwegobo. Hiina ehyabolohaho?
author: Gershom Hirome

title: Thembi and the Singing
description: The other children do not want to play with Thembi. Her favourite place is under the big tree behind their house where she sits sad and alone,  listening to the singing of the tree. Thembi's grandmother worries about Thembi and decides to find out why she is sad and lonely. What will grandmother find out?
author: Orbis Africa

title: Lisimba Lieinzala
description: Lisimba libura mundalo wa matunda amengu kali khwisaka, kerera. Lisimba liruka okhufuna tsinduli, alali likwira omukongo obutinyu. Nelitsiririra okhuruka akulu muno na nelimeta okhukwa hasi efitinyu muno khumukongo. Lilanyalirwa okhunyola tsinduli?
author: Margaret Amateshe

title: Umbala omthubi
description: Izivakalisi zimanyaniswa nemifanekiso etyheli yezinto eziqhelekileyo ekuhlaleni.
author: Ntombizanele Nkence

title: Xitori Xo Hlekisa
description: Lexi i xitori xa swifuwo na vinyi va swona lava swi rhandzaka swinene.
author: Arnold Mushwana

title: Can Satellites Help Identify Extreme Poverty?
Labarin Wata Giwa
description: Wannan labarin wata Giwa ce dake wani daji wai shi Kibale,  ita kadai ce a dajin.
author: Muhammad Tukur Bala

title: Tho Olyewo Hupapa
description: Kigana kwoŋ dhano ma oneno nyaliŋ liŋ pa Tho to ku konyo go.
author: African Storybook
